rooms.description: Entrance hall with a traditional Kerala-style reception area.
Spacious living room with open floor plan and Vastu-compliant orientation towards the east for positive energy flow.
Dining area adjacent to living room, designed for natural light from east-facing windows.
Functional kitchen area with modern facilities while retaining traditional Kerala features.
Master bedroom with attached private balcony facing west to promote relaxation and Vastu alignment.
Bedroom with a spacious balcony facing west; designed for ample light and ventilation.
Secondary bedroom with adjoining balcony on the west side for privacy and Vastu benefits.
Additional bedroom with a compact yet comfortable space including an integrated balcony area oriented westward.
Smallest of the bedrooms, designed for guest use with a minimal yet functional west-facing balcony.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance door placed in the south-east corner to invite positive energy per Vastu.
East-facing window for natural light in living room.
Eastward window to complement Vastu energy and dining experience.
North-facing windows in the kitchen for balanced light while adhering to Vastu norms.
West-facing balcony window ensuring ample ventilation and relaxation space for master bedroom.
